short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalistic extension which sets common cookies (e.g. cookie_notice_accepted=true) to accept cookie notices on all websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cookie Notice Accepted is a minimalistic browser extension which sets cookies to tell your websites that you have accepted the cookie notice, so it wont ask you again.

https://github.com/kreutix/cookie-notice-accepted
